summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AI SEO Growth Engine backend APIs. All 22 tests passed (100%). Tested SEO Core (sitemap.xml, robots.txt, organization schema, FAQ schema), Content Engine (posts, analytics), ASO Engine (keywords, competitor analysis, metadata), and Growth Analytics Dashboard (dashboard, targets).
critical_code_review_comments: All SEO Core endpoints correctly return XML/text for sitemap and robots.txt, and valid JSON for schemas
Organization schema correctly includes all 6 target countries (Germany, Tanzania, Kenya, Uganda, Nigeria, South Africa)
FAQ schema optimized for AI search engines with 8 comprehensive questions about Avida
Content Engine properly enforces admin authentication on analytics endpoint while keeping posts public
ASO Engine provides region-specific keywords for all target markets (TZ, KE, DE, etc.)
Growth Analytics Dashboard returns comprehensive metrics including traffic, content stats, and growth targets
seed_data_creation: 2 blog posts exist from previous testing (Used Cars in Dar es Salaam, Buying Used Phones in Dar es Salaam)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Growth Engine APIs verified working: SEO Core (public endpoints for sitemap, robots.txt, schemas), Content Engine (posts public, analytics requires auth), ASO Engine (all require auth - keywords, competitors, metadata), Growth Analytics (dashboard and targets require auth). Traffic data in dashboard is simulated/sample data. 206 active listings in database.

seo_core_public.notes: Returns valid XML sitemap with proper structure and namespaces
Returns valid robots.txt with AI crawler rules (GPTBot, Google-Extended)
Returns valid Schema.org Organization with 6 target countries
Returns 8 FAQs optimized for AI search engines

content_engine.notes: Public endpoint, returns posts list with pagination
Returns total_posts, published_posts, draft_posts, by_country, by_category, recent_posts

aso_engine.notes: Returns high_volume, medium_volume, low_competition keywords per region
Returns competitors list, insights, and keyword_gaps
Returns list of ASO metadata versions (currently empty)

growth_analytics.notes: Returns overview (posts, listings, citations), traffic metrics, top_content, top_keywords
